title: Daylight.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Daylight.Repack-R.G.Mechanics







Release Info:


Year of release: April 29, 2014.
Genre: Action (Horror)
Developer: Zombie Studios
Publisher: Zombie Studios
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Russian, English
Voice Language: English
Crack: enclosing (3DM)




System Requirements:

Operating System: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
Processor: 2.3+ GHz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Video: DX11 with Feature Level 11
Free space on hard disk: 5 GB available space

Game information:

Daylight - video games in the genre of Survival horror.
The developer and publisher of the game Zombie Studios.
This is the first game created on the graphics engine Unreal Engine 4.

Game Features:

Feature of the game is that every time generated different locations,
each new time the player will play the game in a new location,
the protagonist is a woman, whose name and biography is not yet known.

She wakes up in an abandoned dilapidated mental hospital and can not
remember how it got there. Mental hospital that is known for its brutal
history, that it for many years to conduct cruel experiments on human beings.
Now the souls of dead roam throughout the hospital.

The only source of light for the heroine in an abandoned building -
a mobile phone, which incorporates a flashlight, it helps to pass between
rooms with its own light, but sometimes phone inhabit the ghosts and he
starts to play audio and video files on the life of the heroine, and when
approaching the ghosts starts then turn off, then turn on. Kill the ghosts
can not only scare them away or flares or fluorescent sticks. For orientation
in the building used by the compass, which is embedded in a mobile phone,
UV lamp is also available in the phone, it can help to read the messages
that are written on the walls, fluorescent sticks also help to read the
messages on the walls. On the walls you can read the stories of a mental
hospital and find a way out of the building.

Repack Features:

Daylight
Do not cut / recoded
Game Version: 1.0 (update 9)
crack text from ZoG
